short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Helps people stay connected by keeping track of time.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
TeamZone is a powerful productivity tool that helps users stay connected and on track with their time management. Key features include:

Track Time: Keep an accurate tab on time to boost efficiency.
Connect Teams: Facilitate seamless communication and collaboration across teams.
Low Permissions: Requires minimal permissions, ensuring security and privacy.

This extension is perfect for anyone looking to improve time management while staying connected with team members.
